thread.title: Paul Pierce Gets Huge Ovation With Closing Three-Pointer In His Last Game In Boston
thread.title_full: Paul Pierce Gets Huge Ovation With Closing Three-Pointer In His Last Game In Boston

author: Emma Baccellieri
title: Paul Pierce Gets Huge Ovation With Closing Three-Pointer In His Last Game In Boston
text:
Go to permalink 
Paul Pierce played his last game in Boston today, four years after the Celtics traded him away. In the starting lineup for the first time in more than a month to celebrate his final game at his old stomping grounds, Pierce got a standing ovation from the crowd in recognition of the 15 years he spent as a Celtic. Advertisement 
The Clippers put him back in for the gameâ€™s final seconds, which was long enough to hit one last three-pointer and earn an emotional round of cheers from the crowd: Recommended Stories
